name: CreateAbTestEmailVariation
description:
Create a new variation for an email A/B test.

Use this tool to generate a new variation of an existing email for conducting A/B tests in your marketing campaigns. This is useful for testing different email content to optimize engagement and performance.

parameters.name: variation_name
parameters.description: The name of the new email variation for the A/B test. Provide a descriptive name to easily identify this variation.

parameters.name: email_content_id
parameters.description: ID of the email content to create a variation for A/B testing.
